Package view.beerapp.activities.location_drink

Hold all the activities and fragments for displaying drinks and locations

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDrinkActivity
    The activity in which the user creates a new beer to add to the application.
    AddExistingDrinkActivity
    The activity in which the user can search existing drinks to add them to a location or decide to create one himself.
    AddLocationActivity
    The activity in which the user creates a new location to add to the application.
    DrinkDisplayActivity
    The activity used to show a single drink.
    DrinkFragment
    Fragment used to show drinks in a non selectable list (as in the drinkListActivity)
    DrinkSelectFragment
    Fragment display a list of drinks that can be selected (as in the addExistingBeerActivity)
    LocationDisplayActivity
    Activity that shows a single location.
    LocationFragment
    Fragment to display a list of location

Package view.beerapp.activities.location_drink Description

Hold all the activities and fragments for displaying drinks and locations
